title: Large 1BR 1BA apt, NEW flooring, Quartz countertops, Generous pantry
posting_body: The Viva Apartments is adjacent to Starbird Park in West San Jose and offers one and two bedroom apartments with spacious floor plans, ample storage and cabinet space, and plenty of covered parking.
The ideal location is just minutes from Cupertino, Campbell, Los Gatos, and has easy access to major highways such as 280 and 880, making it great for commuters.
Enjoy quality dining and shopping at the nearby Westfield Valley Fair shopping mall and Santana Row.
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
Photos in ad may not be of actual apartment, however we try our best to use photos similar to the floor plan.
related search terms ::: West San Jose, Starbird Park, San Tomas Expy, 280, 880/17, Santana Row, Westfield Valley Fair, Campbell, Los Gatos, Cupertino
